== Missing Icon bugs in KDE ==

This is a list of missing icons bugs from various KDE menus. After you have triaged or fixed a bug, raise a Launchpad bug for the package, put your name in the second column, and fill in the data and the LP bug number in the third and fourth columns.This will let people know that the bug in that row has been hugged.  

You can also help by identifying missing icons.
